label: ExperienceEvent
comment: An involvement in an experience program in which some thing happens, such as a nature watching, woodware manufacturing, meditation, holiday trip, dinner, theme park visit, could be experienced.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A basic objective, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
The indication of whether or not a choice is allowed for this experience event.
The date sequence number for this experience event.
A distinctive or characteristic part of something.
An indemnity clause, expressed as text, for this experience event.
An instruction, expressed as text, for this experience event.
The meeting date, time, date time, or other date time value for this experience event.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
Common conditions contained in a contract or agreement applicable between trading partners.
TheÂ particular state of something, affected by use, that should be respected.
A reservation guarantee, expressed as text, for this experience event.
The indication of whether or not a reservation is required for this experience event.
A party specified for this experience event.

referencedBy.comment: An event included within this experience product.
